  1. """Template tags for the ``image_gallery`` app."""
  2. from django import template
  4. from filer.models import Image
  6. from image_gallery.models import Gallery
  8. register = template.Library()
  11. @register.inclusion_tag('image_gallery/pictures.html', takes_context=True)
  12. def render_pictures(context, selection='recent', amount=3):
  13. """Template tag to render a list of pictures."""
  14. folder_pks = [gallery.folder.pk for gallery in Gallery.objects.all()]
  15. pictures = Image.objects.filter(folder__id__in=folder_pks)
  16. if selection == 'recent':
  17. context.update({
  18. 'pictures': pictures.order_by('-uploaded_at')[:amount]
  19. })
  20. elif selection == 'random':
  21. context.update({
  22. 'pictures': pictures.order_by('?')[:amount]
  23. })
  24. else:
  25. return None
  26. return context
